artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: See individual entries royal blue & purplr warp. Lt. teal, black, kelly & red weft. Possibly twill variation.Top 2.25" are a tighter weave and incl red and kelly and no black. (royal blue, purple, lt. teal, black, kelly, red)
